attributes.action: Stop Adam Crozier collecting his £2,000,0000 Bonus
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is deplorable that Adam Crozier is hanging on at Royal Mail just to collect up to £2,000,000 as a bonus before heading for ITV.  That kind of money could have really helped Royal Mail to bring in new machines as part of our modernisation upgrade.  Meanwhile his staff have had to endure a pay freeze!

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
